name: SquareHead TEST
description:
SquareHead is a 2D Rythm Game for Windows where you got to shoot till see the zombies die.

Controllers:

W & S = Move Up or Down Alternative

Up & Down Arrow Keys = Move Up or Down

THIS IS A TEST VERSION, just a little bit, but the game is fun

If you have audio lag, just press esc and enter in a level again

You have permission to redistribute, to modify, to use the soundtracks,

 everything and anything

Share this game with your friends, that will be a great help

In newest versions i will add more levels

i hope you enjoy this game!!
